name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant Chords: Tab Connect by UltimateGuitar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect Ultimate Guitar to your Spotify or YouTube to instantly find tabs for the song you‚Äôre listening to

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listen to a song, love it, play it. üé∏

Connect your Ultimate Guitar with Spotify, YouTube or YouTube Music and instantly find chords and tabs of your Now Playing songs. It's like a little tab finder buddy on your music player. 

‚ùó Please note this extension is compatible with websites only, not standalone Spotify or Youtube applications!

üé∂ WITH TAB CONNECT YOU CAN:
- Find chords and tabs of the songs you listen to with one click.
- Create a seamless experience between listening and playing music.
- Find tabs of any embedded Youtube video wherever it is, in just one click.
- Become awesome at what you love best.

ü§ò HOW TO GET STARTED:
- Add the 'Instant Chords: Tab Connect' extension to your Chrome browser.
- Play any song on Spotify, YouTube Music, YouTube, or any site that has Youtube videos embedded. 
- Click the 'Open Chords' button on your player.
- Get instant access to the song‚Äôs chords or tabs on Ultimate-Guitar.com.
- You're ready to play. 

Search for music tabs from your favorite artists the smart way, with Tab Connect. 

No need for an Ultimate Guitar account or subscription ‚Äì it's totally free to find chords and tabs. Just add the extension and you're good to go!
